quotes.quote: Difficulties strengthen the mind, as labor does the body.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: You have power over your mind — not outside events. Realise this, and you will find strength.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Sadness comes, joy comes, and everything passes by. What remains always is the witness. The witness is beyond all polarities.
quotes.author: Osho

quotes.quote: Life is the dancer and you are the dance.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: What you seek is seeking you.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Wherever you are, and whatever you do, be in love.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: May all beings live in happiness, free of suffering and in divine union
quotes.author: Mantra

quotes.quote: Sadness gives depth. Happiness gives height. Sadness gives roots. Happiness gives branches. Happiness is like a tree going into the sky, and sadness is like the roots going down into the womb of the earth. Both are needed, and the higher a tree goes, the deeper it goes, simultaneously. In fact, it is always in proportion. That’s its balance.
quotes.author: Osho

quotes.quote: Sometimes even to live is an act of courage.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Your heart is the size of an ocean. Go find yourself in its hidden depths
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: If you can’t fly, then run. If you can’t run, then walk. If you can’t walk, then crawl. But whatever you do, you have to keep moving forward
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: It is through realizing loving presence as our very essence, through being that presence, that we discover true freedom.
quotes.author: Tara Branch

quotes.quote: Once you make a decision, the universe conspires to make it happen.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: May you live with ease, may you be happy, may you be free from pain.
quotes.author: Loving Kindness Meditation

quotes.quote: Acknowledging the good that you already have in your life is the foundation for all abundance.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: Live life as if everything is rigged in your favor.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Momento Mori
quotes.author: Remember Death

quotes.quote: I accept that life is uncertain--that the goal is not to become more certain about anything but to relax more into the mystery of not knowing what will come next. And then, miracle of miracles, out there in the deep and uncertain water, I come into a peaceful knowing--a faithful wisdom that surpasses control and certainty.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Lesser

quotes.quote: You yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe deserve your love and affection
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: If your compassion does not include yourself, it is incomplete
quotes.author: Jack Kornfield

quotes.quote: What hurts you, blesses you. Darkness is your candle.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Life will give you whatever experience is most helpful for the evolution of your consciousness.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: Forget safety. Live where you fear to live.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: You could leave life right now. Let that determine what you do and say and think.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: On this sacred path of Radical Acceptance, rather than striving for perfection, we discover how to love ourselves into wholeness.
quotes.author: Tara Branch

quotes.quote: Whatever is happening, whatever is changing, whatever is going or not going according to my plans--I release my hold on all of it. I leave behind who I think I am, who I want to be, what I want the world to be. I come home to the great peace of the present moment.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Lesser

quotes.quote: Suffering is part of our training program for becoming wise.
quotes.author: Ram Dass

quotes.quote: To love is to see myself in you and to wish to celebrate myself with you. What I love is the embodiment of my values in another person. Love is an act of self-assertion, self-expression and a celebration of being alive
quotes.author: Nathaniel Branden

quotes.quote: Start from where you are – not where you wish you were. The work you’re doing becomes your path.
quotes.author: Ram Dass

quotes.quote: When we are mindful, deeply in touch with the present moment, our understanding of what is going on deepens, and we begin to be filled with acceptance, joy, peace and love.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: To believe in something, and not to live it, is dishonest.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: We’re here to awaken from the illusion of separateness
quotes.author: Ram Dass

quotes.quote: Sometimes letting things go is an act of far greater power than defending or hanging on
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: He who fears death will never do anything worth of a man who is alive.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Don’t seek for everything to happen as you wish it would, but rather wish that everything happens as it actually will—then your life will flow well.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: What man actually needs is not a tensionless state but rather the striving and struggling for some goal worthy of him.
quotes.author: Viktor Frankl

quotes.quote: Every day, think as you wake up, today I am fortunate to be alive, I have a precious human life, I am not going to waste it. I am going to use all my energies to develop myself, to expand my heart out to others; to achieve enlightenment for the benefit of all beings. I am going to have kind thoughts towards others, I am not going to get angry or think badly about others. I am going to benefit others as much as I can.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Yesterday I was clever, so I wanted to change the world. Today I am wise, so I am changing myself.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Instead of asking “what do I want from life? ” A more powerful question is, “what does life want from me?
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: This is love: to fly toward a secret sky, to cause a hundred veils to fall each moment. First to let go of life. Finally, to take a step without feet.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: People take different roads seeking fulfillment and happiness. Just because they’re not on your road doesn’t mean they’ve gotten lost.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Be. Don’t try to become. Within these two words, be and becoming, your whole life is contained. Being is enlightenment, becoming is ignorance.
quotes.author: Osho

quotes.quote: The world is won by those who let it go.
quotes.author: Ram Dass

quotes.quote: Whatever you encounter, may that be part of the path.
quotes.author: Tara Branch

quotes.quote: Authenticity is a collection of choices that we have to make every day. It’s about the choice to show up and be real. The choice to be honest. The choice to let our true selves be seen
quotes.author: Brené Brown

quotes.quote: Why does the mind habitually deny or resist the Now? Because it cannot function and remain in control without time, which is past and future, so it perceives the timeless Now as threatening. Time and mind are in fact inseparable.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: Mindfulness helps you go home to the present. And every time you go there and recognize a condition of happiness that you have, happiness comes
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: The meaning of life is just to be alive. It is so plain and so obvious and so simple. And yet, everybody rushes around in a great panic as if it were necessary to achieve something beyond themselves.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.quote: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: When we are motivated by compassion and wisdom, the results of our actions benefit everyone, not just our individual selves or some immediate convenience. When we are able to recognize and forgive ignorant actions of the past, we gain strength to constructively solve the problems of the present.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: For life and death are one, even as the river and the sea are one.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: As soon as you’ll realize it was a gift, you’ll be free.
quotes.author: Maxime Lagacé

quotes.quote: Dreams are the touchstones of our characters.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: You must live in the present, launch yourself on every wave, find your eternity in each moment. Fools stand on their island of opportunities and look toward another land. There is no other land; there is no other life but this.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: If we will be quiet and ready enough, we shall find compensation in every disappointment
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Rather than love, than money, than fame, give me truth.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau
